name: Flying Slime
description:
The game is introduced


Flying slime is a horizontal leisure game by utilizing physical gravity to play. With beautiful picture quality and cute protagonist Slime, you can feel different scenes in the game! Using the left and right antennae to control the moving direction, coupled with slime's "weight", you can run faster!

With the corresponding keyboard operation, the operation is more smooth!
ESC: pause/rewind (ESC)
A: start/confirm
B: Back/Cancel
Left: Launch the Lift hook
Right: launch the Right hook

Breakthrough mode


70 levels, from easy to difficult! You can collect moon fragments, leaves and elf stones during every crossing, but be careful, huge gears are chasing behind! If you are not careful, you will be hurt by sawtooth.

With the deepening of Shaoguan mode, moon fragments, leaves and elf stones are collected, which can activate more forms of elf images. Click on the avatar in the upper left corner of the main screen to unlock more elf images.

Click Settings in the upper right corner of the main screen to unlock the trailing effect and appearance effects of the elves.

Endless mode


If you have confidence in the elves you created, then challenge the endless pattern! There is no end here, as long as you are excellent, you can experience unprecedented excitement and urgency! Attention! The huge gear is right behind you!

What are you waiting for? Come and create your slime!
